input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Hospital System Security

An unexpected data breach has been identified in the hospital's system. This issue may have arisen due to outdated security protocols and unpatched software vulnerabilities You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. It is recommended to update the software, conduct a system scan, and implement temporary access restrictions to mitigate the risks. My name is Omar Hassan.
